repo_notes.content: DEVIN//HHS is a Medicaid transparency platform built with Next.js 15 and TimescaleDB. All environment configuration is managed via Vercel dashboard - no credentials are stored in the repository. The .env.local file is gitignored and should never be committed.

pages.title: Overview
pages.purpose: Introduce the DEVIN//HHS Medicaid Transparency Platform and its mission

pages.title: Architecture
pages.purpose: High-level overview of Next.js frontend, API routes, and database layer

pages.title: Frontend
pages.purpose: Next.js 15 App Router structure and page components

pages.title: API Layer
pages.purpose: REST API endpoints for providers, HCPCS codes, and statistics

pages.title: Database
pages.purpose: TimescaleDB schema design and query patterns. Connection via Vercel env vars.

pages.title: Pages
pages.purpose: User-facing pages: Home, Explore, Charts, Provider Detail, HCPCS Detail

pages.title: API Reference
pages.purpose: Complete API documentation for all endpoints

pages.title: Deployment
pages.purpose: Vercel deployment configuration. Environment variables managed in Vercel dashboard.
